00081         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {
00082                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;
00083                 $this->configuration = $configuration;
00084                 $this->templatePath = t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/HTML/backend/';
00085                 $this->templateFile = $this->templatePath.'template.html';
00086                 $this->templateCode = t3lib_div::getURL($this->templateFile);
00087 
00088         }
00089 
00097         protected function init() {
00098                 global $LANG;
00099                 $LANG->includeLLFile('EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang.xml');
00100                 $this->logTable = 'tx_mailformplusplus_log';
00101         }
00102 
00109         public function process() {
00110                 global $LANG;
00111 
00112                 //init
00113                 $this->init();
00114 
00115                 //init gp params
00116                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00117 
00118                 //should delete records
00119                 if($params['delete'] && isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00120 
00121                         //delete records
00122                         $this->deleteRecords($params['markedUids']);
00123 
00124                         //select all records
00125                         $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00126 
00127                         //show table
00128                         $table = $this->getTable($records);
00129 
00130                         return $table;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 //should show index
00134                 if(!$params['detailId'] && !$params['markedUids']) {
00135 
00136                         //if log table doesn't exist, show error
00137                         $tables = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->admin_get_tables();
00138                         if(!in_array($this->logTable,array_keys($tables))) {
00139                                 return $this->getErrorMessage();
00140 
00141                                 //show index table
00142                         } else {
00143 
00144                                 //select all records
00145                                 $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00146 
00147                                 //show table
00148                                 $table = $this->getTable($records);
00149                                 return $table;
00150                         }
00151 
00152                         //should export to some format
00153                 } elseif(!$params['delete']) {
00154 
00155                         //should show detail view of a single record
00156                         if(!$params['renderMethod']) {
00157 
00158                                 return $this->showSingleView($params['detailId']);
00159 
00160                                 //PDF generation
00161                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"pdf")) {
00162 
00163                                 //render a single record to PDF
00164                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00165                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['detailId']);
00166 
00167                                         //render many records to PDF
00168                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00169                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['markedUids']);
00170                                 }
00171 
00172                                 //CSV
00173                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"csv")) {
00174 
00175                                 //save single record as CSV
00176                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00177                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['detailId']);
00178 
00179                                         //save many records as CSV
00180                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00181                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['markedUids']);
00182                                 }
00183 
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186         }
00187 
00195         protected function deleteRecords($uids) {
00196                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery($this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$uids).")");
00197         }
00198 
00208         protected function generatePDF($detailId) {
00209 
00210                 /*
00211                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00212                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00213                  */
00214                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00215                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00216                 }
00217 
00218                 //init gp params
00219                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00220 
00221                 //select the records
00222                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00223 
00224                 //if records were found
00225                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00226                         $records = array();
00227                         $allParams = array();
00228 
00229                         //loop through records
00230                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00231 
00232                                 //unserialize params and save the array
00233                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00234                                 $records[] = $row;
00235                                 if(!is_array($row['params'])) {
00236                                         $row['params'] = array();
00237                                 }
00238 
00239                                 //sum up all params for selection view
00240                                 $allParams = array_merge($allParams,$row['params']);
00241                         }
00242 
00243                         //if fields were chosen in selection view, export the records using the selected fields
00244                         if(isset($gp['exportParams'])) {
00245                                 $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF");
00246                                 $generator->generateModulePDF($records,$gp['exportParams']);
00247 
00248                                 /*
00249                                  * show selection view to find out which fields to export.
00250                                  * This enables the user to get rid of fields like submitted or mp-step
00251                                  */
00252                         } else {
00253                                 return $this->generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($allParams);
00254                         }
00255                 }
00256         }
00257 
00268         protected function generateCSV($detailId) {
00269 
00270                 /*
00271                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00272                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00273                  */
00274                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00275                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00276                 }
00277 
00278                 //init gp params
00279                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00280 
00281                 //select the records to export
00282                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params,key_hash",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00283 
00284                 //if record were found
00285                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00286                         $records = array();
00287                         $count = 0;
00288                         $hashes = array();
00289                         $availableFormats = array();
00290 
00291                         //loop through records
00292                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00293 
00294                                 //unserialize the params array
00295                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00296 
00297                                 //find the amount of different formats to inform the user.
00298                                 if(!in_array($row['key_hash'],$hashes)) {
00299                                         $hashes[] = $row['key_hash'];
00300                                         $availableFormats[] = $row['params'];
00301                                 }
00302                                 $records[] = $row;
00303                         }
00304                         
00305                         $availableFormatsCount = count($availableFormats);
00306                 
00307                         //only one format found
00308                         if($availableFormatsCount == 1) {
00309                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00310                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00311                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00312                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($records,$params['exportParams']);
00313 
00314                                         //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00315                                 } else {
00316                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($records[0]['params']);
00317                                 }
00318 
00319                                 //more than one format and user has chosen a format to export
00320                         } elseif(isset($params['csvFormat'])) {
00321 
00322                                 //select the format
00323                                 $format = $hashes[$params['csvFormat']];
00324                                 $renderRecords = array();
00325 
00326                                 //find out which records belong to this format
00327                                 foreach($records as $record) {
00328                                         if(!strcmp($record['key_hash'],$format)) {
00329                                                 $renderRecords[] = $record;
00330                                         }
00331                                 }
00332 
00333                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00334                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00335                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00336                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($renderRecords,$params['exportParams']);
00337 
00338                                         //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00339                                 } else {
00340                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($renderRecords[0]['params']);
00341                                 }
00342 
00343                                 //more than one format and none chosen by now, show format selection view.
00344                         } else {
00345                                 return $this->generateFormatsSelector($availableFormats,$detailId);
00346                         }
00347                 }
00348         }
00349 
00358         protected function generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00359                 global $LANG;
00360 
00361                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00362                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00363                         $params = array();
00364                 }
00365 
00366                 //init gp params
00367                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00368                 $selectorCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###EXPORT_FIELDS_SELECTOR###');
00369                 
00370                 $markers = array();
00371                 $markers['###LLL:select_export_fields###'] = $LANG->getLL('select_export_fields');
00372                 $markers['###SELECTION###'] = $this->getSelectionBox();
00373                 $markers['###URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00374 
00375                 //the selected format to export
00376                 $markers['###CSV_FORMAT###'] = $gp['csvFormat'];
00377                 $markers['###RENDER_METHOD###'] = $gp['renderMethod'];
00378 
00379                 /*
00380                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00381                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00382                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00383                  */
00384                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00385                 if(!$detailId) {
00386                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00387                 }
00388                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00389                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00390                 }
00391 
00392                 $markers['###SELECTED_RECORDS###'] = '';
00393                 
00394                 //the selected records in a previous step
00395                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00396                         $markers['###SELECTED_RECORDS###'] .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00397                 }
00398 
00399                 $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] = '';
00400                 
00401                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00402                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00403                         $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00404                 }
00405 
00406                 $markers['###LLL:export###'] = $LANG->getLL('export');
00407                 $returnCode = $this->getSelectionJS();
00408                 $returnCode .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($selectorCode,$markers);
00409                 
00410                 return $returnCode; 
00411         }
00412 
00421         protected function generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00422                 global $LANG;
00423 
00424                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00425                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00426                         $params = array();
00427                 }
00428 
00429                 //init gp params
00430                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00431                 $selectorCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###EXPORT_FIELDS_SELECTOR###');
00432                 
00433                 $markers = array();
00434                 $markers['###LLL:select_export_fields###'] = $LANG->getLL('select_export_fields');
00435                 $markers['###SELECTION###'] = $this->getSelectionBox();
00436                 $markers['###URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00437 
00438                 //the selected format to export
00439                 $markers['###CSV_FORMAT###'] = $gp['csvFormat'];
00440                 $markers['###RENDER_METHOD###'] = $gp['renderMethod'];
00441 
00442                 /*
00443                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00444                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00445                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00446                  */
00447                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00448                 if(!$detailId) {
00449                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00450                 }
00451                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00452                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00453                 }
00454 
00455                 $markers['###SELECTED_RECORDS###'] = '';
00456                 
00457                 //the selected records in a previous step
00458                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00459                         $markers['###SELECTED_RECORDS###'] .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00460                 }
00461 
00462                 $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] = '';
00463                 $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="ip" />'.$LANG->getLL('ip_address').'</td></tr>';
00464                 $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="submission_date" />'.$LANG->getLL('submission_date').'</td></tr>';
00465                 $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="pid" />'.$LANG->getLL('page_id').'</td></tr>';
00466                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00467                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00468                         $markers['###EXPORTFIELDS###'] .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00469                 }
00470 
00471                 $markers['###LLL:export###'] = $LANG->getLL('export');
00472                 $returnCode = $this->getSelectionJS();
00473                 $returnCode .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($selectorCode,$markers);
00474                 
00475                 return $returnCode; 
00476         }

00484         protected function getSelectionJS() {

00497         protected function generateFormatsSelector($formats,$detailId) {
00498                 global $LANG;
00499                 /*
00500                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00501                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00502                  */
00503                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00504                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00505                 }
00506 
00507                 $selectorCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###FORMATS_SELECTOR###');
00508                 
00509                 $foundFormats = 0;
00510                 
00511                 //loop through formats
00512                 foreach($formats as $key=>$format) {
00513                         
00514                         $formatMarkers = array();
00515                         
00516                         //if format is valid
00517                         if(isset($format) && is_array($format)) {
00518                                 $foundFormats++;
00519                                 $code = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###SINGLE_FORMAT###');
00520                                 $formatMarkers['###URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00521 
00522                                 $formatMarkers['###HIDDEN_FIELDS###'] = '';
00523                                 //add hidden fields for all selected records to export
00524                                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00525                                         $formatMarkers['###HIDDEN_FIELDS###'] .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00526                                 }
00527                                 $formatMarkers['###KEY###'] = $key;
00528                                 $formatMarkers['###LLL:export###'] = $LANG->getLL('export');
00529                                 $formatMarkers['###FORMAT###'] = implode(",",array_keys($format));
00530                                 $markers['###FORMATS###'] .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($code,$formatMarkers);
00531                         }
00532                         
00533                 }
00534                 
00535                 $markers['###LLL:formats_found###'] = sprintf($LANG->getLL('formats_found'),$foundFormats);
00536                 $markers['###BACK_URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00537                 $markers['###LLL:back###'] = $LANG->getLL('back');
00538                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($selectorCode,$markers);
00539         }
00540 
00548         protected function showSingleView($singleUid) {
00549                 global $LANG;
00550 
00551 
00552                 //select the record
00553                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid=".$singleUid);
00554 
00555                 //if UID was valid
00556                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00557                         $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00558 
00559                         $viewCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###DETAIL_VIEW###');
00560 
00561                         //unserialize params
00562                         $params = unserialize($row['params']);
00563 
00564                         $markers = array();
00565 
00566                         //start with default fields (IP address, submission date, PID)
00567                         $markers['###PID###'] = $row['pid'];
00568                         $markers['###CRDATE###'] = date("Y/m/d H:i",$row['crdate']);
00569                         $markers['###IP###'] = $row['ip'];
00570 
00571                         $markers['###LLL:page_id###'] = $LANG->getLL('page_id');
00572                         $markers['###LLL:crdate###'] = $LANG->getLL('crdate');
00573                         $markers['###LLL:ip_address###'] = $LANG->getLL('ip_address');
00574 
00575                         //add the submitted params
00576                         if(isset($params) && is_array($params)) {
00577                                 $paramsTable .= '<table>';
00578                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00579                                         if(is_array($value)) {
00580                                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00581                                         }
00582                                         $paramsTable .= '
00583                                                 <tr>
00584                                                         <td style="font-weight:bold">'.$key.'</td>
00585                                                         <td>'.$value.'</td>
00586                                                 </tr>
00587                                         ';
00588                                 }
00589                                 $paramsTable .= '</table>';
00590                         }
00591                         $markers['###LLL:params###'] = $LANG->getLL('params');
00592                         $markers['###PARAMS###'] = $paramsTable;
00593 
00594 
00595                         $markers['###LLL:export_as###'] = $LANG->getLL('export_as');
00596                         $markers['###EXPORT_LINKS###'] = '<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">'.$LANG->getLL('pdf').'</a>
00597                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">'.$LANG->getLL('csv').'</a>';
00598                         $markers['###BACK_LINK###'] = '<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">'.$LANG->getLL('back').'</a>';
00599                         $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($viewCode,$markers);
00600                         $content = $this->addCSS($content);
00601                         return $content;
00602                 }
00603         }

00611         protected function getErrorMessage() {
00612                 global $LANG;
00613                 $code = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###NO_TABLE_ERROR###');
00614                 $markers = array();
00615                 $markers['###LLL:noLogTable###'] = $LANG->getLL('noLogTable');
00616                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($code,$markers);
00617         }
00618 
00625         protected function fetchRecords() {
00626                 $records = array();
00627 
00628                 //build WHERE clause
00629                 $where = $this->buildWhereClause();
00630 
00631                 //select the records
00632                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,$where);
00633 
00634                 //if records found
00635                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00636                         $count = 0;
00637                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00638                                 $records[$count] = $row;
00639                                 $count++;
00640                         }
00641                 }
00642                 return $records;
00643         }
00644 
00651         protected function buildWhereClause() {
00652 
00653                 //init gp params
00654                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00655                 $where = array();
00656 
00657                 //if only records of a specific PID should be shown
00658                 if(strlen(trim($params['pidFilter'])) > 0) {
00659                         $where[] = "pid IN (".$params['pidFilter'].")";
00660                 }
00661 
00662                 //only records submitted after given timestamp
00663                 if(strlen(trim($params['startdateFilter'])) > 0) {
00664                         $tstamp = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::dateToTimestamp($params['startdateFilter']);
00665                         $where[] = "crdate >= ".$tstamp;
00666                 }
00667 
00668                 //only records submitted before given timestamp
00669                 if(strlen(trim($params['enddateFilter'])) > 0) {
00670                         $tstamp = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::dateToTimestamp($params['enddateFilter'],true);
00671                         $where[] = "crdate <= ".$tstamp;
00672                 }
00673 
00674                 //if filter was applied, return the WHERE clause
00675                 if(count($where) > 0) {
00676                         return implode(" AND ",$where);
00677                 }
00678         }
00679 
00686         protected function getFilterSection() {
00687                 global $LANG;
00688 
00689                 //init gp params
00690                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00691 
00692                 $filter = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###FILTER_FORM###');
00693 
00694                 $markers = array();
00695                 $markers['###URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00696                 $markers['###LLL:filter###'] = $LANG->getLL('filter');
00697                 $markers['###LLL:pid_label###'] = $LANG->getLL('pid_label');
00698                 $markers['###LLL:cal###'] = $LANG->getLL('cal');
00699                 $markers['###LLL:startdate###'] = $LANG->getLL('startdate');
00700                 $markers['###LLL:enddate###'] = $LANG->getLL('enddate');
00701 
00702                 $this->addValueMarkers($markers,$params);
00703 
00704 
00705                 $filter .= $this->getCalendarJS();
00706 
00707 
00708                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($filter,$markers);
00709         }
00710 
00720         protected function addValueMarkers(&$markers,$params) {
00721                 if(is_array($params)) {
00722                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00723                                 $markers['###value_'.$key.'###'] = $value;
00724                         }
00725                 }
00726         }
00727 
00734         protected function getCalendarJS() {
00735                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###CALENDAR_JS###');
00736         }
00737 
00745         protected function getFunctionArea() {
00746 
00747                 $code = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###FUNCTION_AREA###');
00748                 $markers = array();
00749                 $markers['###URL###'] = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00750                 $markers['###EXPORT_FIELDS_MARKER###'] = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###EXPORT_FIELDS###');
00751                 $markers['###DELETE_FIELDS_MARKER###'] = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###DELETE_FIELDS###');
00752                 $markers['###SELECTION_BOX_MARKER###'] = $this->getSelectionBox();
00753                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($code,$markers);
00754         }
00755 
00762         protected function getSelectionBox() {
00763                 global $LANG;
00764                 $code = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###SELECTION_BOX###');
00765                 $markers = array();
00766                 $markers['###LLL:select_all###'] = $LANG->getLL('select_all');
00767                 $markers['###LLL:deselect_all###'] = $LANG->getLL('deselect_all');
00768                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($code,$markers);
00769         }
00770 
00778         protected function getTable(&$records) {
00779                 global $LANG;
00780 
00781                 if(count($records) == 0) {
00782                         return '<div>'.$LANG->getLL('no_records').'</div>';
00783                 }
00784 
00785 
00786                 //init gp params
00787                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00788 
00789 
00790                 //get filter
00791                 $table = $this->getFilterSection();
00792                 //add JavaScript
00793                 $table .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00794                 $table .= $this->getFunctionArea();
00795                 $tableCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###LIST_TABLE###');
00796 
00797                 $tableMarkers = array();
00798                 $tableMarkers['###LLL:PAGE_ID###'] = $LANG->getLL('page_id');
00799                 $tableMarkers['###LLL:SUBMISSION_DATE###'] = $LANG->getLL('submission_date');
00800                 $tableMarkers['###LLL:IP###'] = $LANG->getLL('ip_address');
00801                 //$tableMarkers['###LLL:DETAIL_VIEW###'] = $LANG->getLL('detail_view');
00802                 $tableMarkers['###LLL:DETAIL_VIEW###'] = '';
00803                 $tableMarkers['###LLL:EXPORT###'] = $LANG->getLL('export');
00804 
00805                 $count = 1;
00806                 $tableMarkers['###ROWS###'] = '';
00807                 //add records
00808                 foreach($records as $record) {
00809                         if($count % 2 == 0) {
00810                                 $style = 'class="bgColor3-20"';
00811                         } else {
00812                                 $style = 'class="bgColor3-40"';
00813                         }
00814                         $rowCode = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###LIST_TABLE_ROW###');
00815                         $markers = array();
00816                         $markers['###ROW_STYLE###'] = $style;
00817                         $markers['###PID###'] = $record['pid'];
00818                         $markers['###SUBMISSION_DATE###'] = date('Y/m/d H:i',$record['crdate']);
00819                         $markers['###IP###'] = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00820                         //$markers['###DETAIL_LINK###'] = '<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'">'.$LANG->getLL('show').'</a>';
00821                         $markers['###DETAIL_LINK###'] = '<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'"><img '.t3lib_iconWorks::skinImg('../../../../../../typo3/','gfx/zoom.gif').'/></a>';
00822                         $markers['###EXPORT_LINKS###'] = '<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">PDF</a>
00823                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">CSV</a>';
00824                         $checkbox = '<input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$record['uid'].'" ';
00825                         if(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids']) && in_array($record['uid'],$params['markedUids'])) {
00826                                 $checkbox .= 'checked="checked"';
00827                         }
00828                         $checkbox .= '/>';
00829                         $markers['###CHECKBOX###'] = $checkbox;
00830                         $count++;
00831                         $tableMarkers['###ROWS###'] .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($rowCode,$markers);
00832                 }
00833 
00834                 //add Export as option
00835                 $table .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteMarkerArray($tableCode,$tableMarkers);
00836                 $table .= F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getSubpart($this->templateCode,'###EXPORT_FIELDS###');
00837                 $table = $this->addCSS($table);
00838                 return F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($table);
00839         }
00840 
00848         protected function addCSS($content) {
00849                 #$cssLink = '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/CSS/backend/styles.css'.'" />';
00850                 $cssLink = '
00851                         <link   rel="stylesheet" 
00852                                         type="text/css" 
00853                                         href="../../../Resources/CSS/backend/styles.css" 
00854                         />
00855                 ';
00856                 return $cssLink.$content;
00857         }
